64#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_1_DISABLE 0
66#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_2_DISABLE 0

71#undef AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_1_DISABLE
72#undef AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_2_DISABLE
73#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_1_DISABLE 1
74#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TRIMVER_2_DISABLE 1
75#endif

87#define DEVPWRST_ALL_PERIPH_MASK 0xFFFDE6FE
91#define DEVPWRST_BOOST_VDDCF_PERIPH_MASK 0xCFFDC0E0
94#define DEVPWRST_BOOST_VDDC_PERIPH_MASK 0x3000061E
96#define AUDSSPWRST_ALL_PERIPH_MASK 0x44
98#define DEVPWRST_MONITOR_PERIPH_MASK_PS1 DEVPWRST_BOOST_VDDCF_PERIPH_MASK
100#define DEVPWRST_MONITOR_PERIPH_MASK_PS2 DEVPWRST_BOOST_VDDC_PERIPH_MASK
102#define DEVPWRST_MONITOR_PERIPH_MASK DEVPWRST_ALL_PERIPH_MASK
104#define AUDSSPWRST_MONITOR_PERIPH_MASK_PS1 AUDSSPWRST_ALL_PERIPH_MASK
106#define AUDSSPWRST_MONITOR_PERIPH_MASK AUDSSPWRST_ALL_PERIPH_MASK
107
108//*****************************************************************************

112//*****************************************************************************
113
114//
116//
117typedef union
118{
119 uint32_t PWRSTATE0TRIM;
120 struct
121 {
122 uint32_t VDDCRXCOMPTRIMMINUS : 5;
123 uint32_t VDDFRXCOMPTRIMMINUS : 5;
124 uint32_t : 22;
125 } PWRSTATE0TRIM_b;
126} am_hal_spotmgr_trim_settings_t;
127
128//
130//
131typedef union
132{
133 uint32_t CNTRCTRL2;
134 struct
135 {
136 uint32_t FCNT1 : 16;
137 uint32_t FCNT2 : 16;
138 } CNTRCTRL2_b;
139} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_cntrctrl2_settings_t;
140
141//
143//
144typedef union
145{
146 uint32_t LPTHRESH;
147 struct
148 {
149 uint32_t LPTHRESHVDD : 20;
150 uint32_t : 12;
151 } LPTHRESH_b;
152} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t;
153
154//
156//
157typedef union
158{
159 uint32_t LPHYST;
160 struct
161 {
162 uint32_t LPHYSTCNT : 20;
163 uint32_t : 12;
164 } LPHYST_b;
165} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lphyst_settings_t;
166
167//
169//
170typedef union
171{
172 uint32_t ACTTHRESH1;
173 struct
174 {
175 uint32_t ACTTHRESHVDDF : 16;
176 uint32_t ACTTHRESHVDDS : 16;
177 } ACTTHRESH1_b;
178} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh1_t;
179
180//
182//
183typedef union
184{
185 uint32_t ACTTHRESH2;
186 struct
187 {
188 uint32_t ACTTHRESHVDDCLV : 16;
189 uint32_t ACTTHRESHVDDC : 16;
190 } ACTTHRESH2_b;
191} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh2_t;
192
193//
195//
196typedef union
197{
198 uint32_t ACTTHRESH3;
199 struct
200 {
201 uint32_t ACTTHRESHVDDRF : 16;
202 uint32_t : 16;
203 } ACTTHRESH3_b;
204} am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh3_t;
205
206//
208//
209typedef struct
210{
211 uint32_t ui32SpotMgrINFO1GlobalValid;
212 am_hal_spotmgr_trim_settings_t sPowerState0Trims; // 0x1440
213 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_cntrctrl2_settings_t sScmCntrCtrl2; // 0x1444
214 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t sScmLpThreshVdds; // 0x1448
215 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t sScmLpThreshVddf; // 0x144C
216 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t sScmLpThreshVddc; // 0x1450
217 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t sScmLpThreshVddclv; // 0x1454
218 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lpthresh_settings_t sScmLpThreshVddrf; // 0x1458
219 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_lphyst_settings_t sScmLpHystCnt; // 0x145C
220 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh1_t sScmActThresh1; // 0x1460
221 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh2_t sScmActThresh2; // 0x1464
222 am_hal_spotmgr_scm_actthresh3_t sScmActThresh3; // 0x1468
223} am_hal_spotmgr_info1_regs_t;

235{

237 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_ACTIVE_HP1,
238 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_ACTIVE_HP2,
239 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_SLEEP_DEEP,
240 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_SLEEP_DEEPER,
241 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_SLEEP_ARM, // Place holder - may be used in the future
242 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_CPUSTATE_SLEEP_AMB, // Place holder - may be used in the future
243} am_hal_spotmgr_cpu_state_e;

263 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_TEMPCO_RANGE_HIGH,

267//
269//
270typedef struct
271{
272 uint32_t ui32DevPwrSt; // Place holder - may be used in the future
273 uint32_t ui32AudSSPwrSt; // Place holder - may be used in the future
274 uint32_t ui32MemPwrSt; // Place holder - may be used in the future
275 uint32_t ui32SsramPwrSt; // Place holder - may be used in the future
276 am_hal_spotmgr_tempco_range_e eTempRange;
277 am_hal_spotmgr_cpu_state_e eCpuState;
278 am_hal_spotmgr_gpu_state_e eGpuState;
279} am_hal_spotmgr_power_status_t;

297typedef enum
298{
300 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_CPU_STATE,
302 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_GPU_STATE,
304 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_TEMP,
306 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_DEVPWR,
308 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_AUDSSPWR,
310 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_MEMPWR, // Place holder - may be used in the future
312 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_SSRAMPWR, // Place holder - may be used in the future
314 AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_STIM_INIT_STATE,
315} am_hal_spotmgr_stimulus_e;

324//
325// Define macro AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING to enable SPOTMGR profiling functionality.
326// Define macro AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_VERBOSE to enable verbose entries.
327//
328// #define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING
329// #define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_VERBOSE
330
331//
332// SPOT manager Profiling struct and markers
333//
334#ifdef AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING
335typedef struct
336{
337 union
338 {
339 struct
340 {
341 uint32_t pwrState : 6;
342 uint32_t tonState : 6;
343 uint32_t eStimulus : 4;
344 uint32_t bOn : 2;
345 uint32_t resv : 14;
346 } s;
347 uint32_t u32;
348 } u;
349 uint32_t args;
350} am_hal_spotmgr_changelog_t;
351
352#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_PWRST_INVALID 0x3F
353#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_TONST_INVALID 0x3F
354#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_TONST_VERBOSE 0x3E
355#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_ESTIM_INVALID 0xF
356#define AM_HAL_SPOTMGR_PROFILING_BON_INVALID 0x3
357#endif
